summary:
## Enron Scandal: A Simple Summary

The Enron scandal was a big problem with money at a large American energy company called Enron. Company leaders used tricky accounting to hide huge debts and make the company seem more successful than it was. When the truth came out in 2001, Enron went bankrupt, and many people lost their jobs and savings.

The scandal led to new rules to make sure companies tell the truth about their money. Some Enron leaders went to jail for their part in the deception.
title: Enron scandal
